thread.title: Almost 5 full stars for this little gem - Review
thread.title_full: Almost 5 full stars for this little gem - Review of Warwick New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Karen N
title: Almost 5 full stars for this little gem - Review
text: Lovely hotel in great location esp for first-time tourist in NYC. Great value for rate; nice, well-appointed room & updated bathroom. Only complaint is no coffeemaker in room so be sure to request one at check-in. Also be aware that if you get two beds they will be full, not queen. Comfy and nice linens and pillows though!
